762660.name: Fantasy Grounds - Fundamental Fantasy Map Pack by Joshua Watmough (Map Pack)
762660.description:
Fundamental Fantasy Map Pack by Joshua Watmough

This map pack brings all the fundamental environments to any fantasy setting from woodland trails to the high seas and much in between. Jungles and chasms spanned by rope bridges, lighthouses and cliff side fortifications. These hand drawn 100 by 100 pixel based grid maps are a perfect addition to your Fantasy Grounds map collection
This pack includes the following maps (one with a grid and one without for each map):
  • 2 Chasms
  • Cliffside Fort
  • Dungeon
  • Forest Cottage
  • Forest Map
  • Goblin Warren Entrance
  • 3 Jungles
  • Lighthouse
  • Mountain Base
  • Necromancer's Lair
  • Ship (Grid only)
  • Underwater Caves
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Joshua Watmough
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
